scenes.background: [Bob] frowns, leaning back in his chair. [Monica] looks at the clock.
scenes.description: Why are we delaying so much? This is wasting our time!

options.text: Monica, let's respect the process to ensure we don't miss any details.
options.analysis: You emphasized the importance of thoroughness, showing strong self-regulation and social skills, but less empathy towards Bob's frustration.

options.text: I understand your concern, Bob. Let's try to speed up without compromising quality.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Bob's frustration and aimed for a balanced approach, demonstrating good emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: Maybe we're overcomplicating things. Why not decide on a simpler solution?
options.analysis: You suggested a simpler approach, showing good motivation to resolve quickly but less self-regulation and empathy.
